entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 7:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
